unnormalised: Delhi HC grants interim injunction in copyright infringement case. A local textile company, "Desi Prints," was allegedly copying designs trademarked by "Global Fabrics Ltd." Justice Sharma issued the order on 10/26/2024, preventing Desi Prints from further use of the disputed patterns.
normalised: Delhi High Court grants interim injunction in copyright infringement case. A local textile company, "Desi Prints," was allegedly copying designs trademarked by "Global Fabrics Limited." Justice Sharma issued the order on twenty sixth October two thousand and twenty four, preventing Desi Prints from further use of the disputed patterns.

unnormalised: Global Fabrics Ltd., represented by Adv. Mehra, claimed significant financial losses due to the infringement. They filed the case on 09/15/2024. Desi Prints' legal team, led by Adv. Kapoor, argued that the designs were generic and lacked originality. However, the HC wasn't convinced, at least for now.
normalised: Global Fabrics Limited., represented by Advocate Mehra, claimed significant financial losses due to the infringement. They filed the case on fifteenth September two thousand and twenty four. Desi Prints' legal team, led by Advocate Kapoor, argued that the designs were generic and lacked originality. However, the High Court wasn't convinced, at least for now.

unnormalised: The next hearing is scheduled for 12/15/2024. Looks like this IP battle is just heating up, folks! The judge has asked for more documents to be submitted. Costs of the lawsuit are estimated to be around Rs. 50,000. We'll keep you updated.
normalised: The next hearing is scheduled for fifteenth December two thousand and twenty four. Looks like this I-P battle is just heating up, folks! The judge has asked for more documents to be submitted. Costs of the lawsuit are estimated to be around rupees fifty thousand. We'll keep you updated.
